dashboard.label: Splunk Instrumentation
dashboard.description: High level statistics on Splunk deployment over time

html.h2: Opt-in to sharing instrumentation data with Splunk
html.p: Instrumentation data will be gathered daily to provide a snapshot of the Splunk deployment's performance. Data can be viewed in the index _telemetry, and can be easily exported to a file, or sent directly to Splunk. Opting in to automatically send data to Splunk helps Splunk improve performance of product and services.

ul.li: Opt-in/out - Choose what type of data you want to automatically share with Splunk, Anonymized usage and/or License usage data
View Log - View data collected and sent
Export/Send - Export data to a file, which may be shared with Splunk, or initiate a one-time send of data to Splunk
